title: Pattern Meta Schema
description: Meta data that describes a pattern (component, layout, etc) that comes from the Basalt Crux Design System.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title or Name of the pattern.

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifying machine friendly name of pattern. Usually the 'Block' in 'BEM'.

name.title: Template Name
name.description: Path (prefixed with namespace) of pattern template. Example '@components/_media-block.twig'.

dosAndDonts.description: Visual representations of what to do, and not to do, with components.

title.title: Example Name
title.description: Title for component do's and don'ts example

description.title: Example Description
description.description: More details about the contrasting examples for this component.

caption.title: Caption
caption.description: Description of what they should or should not be doing. Will automatically be preceded by 'do' or 'don't'.

do.title: Do or Don't
do.description: Boolean to denote if this example is a 'Do' or a 'Don't'.

demoSize.title: Demo Size
demoSize.description: Size at which to demo this component
